title: Why am I lagging?
body: I was in the middle of a game, when it starting lagging like heck. A crazy match, and a crazy lag. Somebody help me pls.

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes can be cause by a poor connection or packet loss, and end up in what you're experiencing like input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches this is happening in to get an overview of what's going on.  The results will also provide troubleshooting instructions specific to your case.  Let me know what you find!

What was your FPS? Your ping? Specs? Give us something to work with. Also, this http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update

Like, I couldn't move or anything, and my attacks did nothing
halp

> [{quoted}](name=Enthrim the Pure,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jkQPdNN2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-16T14:45:20.650+0000)
>
> Like, I couldn't move or anything, and my attacks did nothing
> halp

Also, no moving, and if I did move, I slid around- no leg movement at all
